title: 1988 SPCN Double Axle 18' Flatbed Trailer With Side Platforms
item_description:
1988 SPCN Double Axle 18' Flatbed Trailer With Side Platforms

Trailer Details

  • Year: 1988
  • Make: Special Construction
  • Vin: CA458030
  • License: 4SU1021
    • Expiration Date: 1/31/2027

Dimensions

  • Overall Length: 230”
  • Overall Width: 103”
  • Overall Height: 147”
  • Deck Length: 18’
  • Deck Width: 8’
  • Side platform: 17”
  • Tongue length: 68”

Axles, Brakes, and Tires

  • Suspension: Air Ride
  • Number of Axles: 2
  • Brake Type: Drum Brakes
  • Number of Wheels: 4
  • Tire Size: 10.00R20
  • Electric Plug Type: 7-way round
  • Hitch: Pintle

Note: Certificate of Title, and Transfer Form will be mailed once 1-2 weeks after removal. The Bidder shall not bid on behalf of another individual; the Bidder/Purchaser/DMV Registrant must be the same. The Buyer is fully responsible for all aspects of registration, transfer, sales tax, and fees due to the DMV.
